verses.verse: לֹא־ <WH3808> shall not תִזְבַּח֩ <WH2076> Thou shalt not sacrifice לַיהוָ֨ה <WH3068> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֜יךָ <WH430> thy God שׁ֣וֹר <WH7794> [any] bullock וָשֶׂ֗ה <WH7716> or sheep אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which יִהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> has בוֹ֙ מ֔וּם <WH3971> wherein is blemish כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> any דָּבָ֣ר <WH1697> act רָ֑ע <WH7451> adversity כִּ֧י <WH3588> is a תוֹעֲבַ֛ת <WH8441> for that [is] an abomination יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> thy God הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he ס

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> If יִמָּצֵ֤א <WH4672> If there be found בְקִרְבְּךָ֙ <WH7130> among בְּאַחַ֣ד <WH259> you within any שְׁעָרֶ֔יךָ <WH8179> of thy gates אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> thy God נֹתֵ֣ן <WH5414> giveth לָ֑ךְ אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> thee man אוֹ־ <WH176> or אִשָּׁ֗ה <WH802> or woman אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> who יַעֲשֶׂ֧ה <WH6213> that hath wrought אֶת־ <WH853> הָרַ֛ע <WH7451> wickedness בְּעֵינֵ֥י <WH5869> in the sight יְהוָֽה־ <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> thy God לַעֲבֹ֥ר <WH5674> in transgressing בְּרִיתֽוֹ׃ <WH1285> his covenant

וַיֵּ֗לֶךְ <WH1980> gone וַֽיַּעֲבֹד֙ <WH5647> and served אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> gods אֲחֵרִ֔ים <WH312> other וַיִּשְׁתַּ֖חוּ <WH7812> and worshipped לָהֶ֑ם וְלַשֶּׁ֣מֶשׁ ׀ <WH8121> them either the sun א֣וֹ <WH176> or לַיָּרֵ֗חַ <WH3394> or moon א֛וֹ <WH176> or לְכָל־ <WH3605> any צְבָ֥א <WH6635> or any of the host הַשָּׁמַ֖יִם <WH8064> of heaven אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which לֹא־ <WH3808> have not צִוִּֽיתִי׃ <WH6680> which I have not commanded

וְהֻֽגַּד־ <WH5046> And it be told לְךָ֖ וְשָׁמָ֑עְתָּ <WH8085> thee and thou hast heard וְדָרַשְׁתָּ֣ <WH1875> [of it] and enquired הֵיטֵ֔ב <WH3190> diligently וְהִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> Behold אֱמֶת֙ <WH571> and behold [it be] true נָכ֣וֹן <WH3559> certain הַדָּבָ֔ר <WH1697> [and] the thing נֶעֶשְׂתָ֛ה <WH6213> is wrought הַתּוֹעֵבָ֥ה <WH8441> [that] such abomination הַזֹּ֖את <WH2063> in בְּיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> in Israel

וְהֽוֹצֵאתָ֣ <WH3318> Then shalt thou bring forth אֶת־ <WH853> הָאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> that man הַה֡וּא <WH1931> he אוֹ֩ <WH176> or אֶת־ <WH853> הָאִשָּׁ֨ה <WH802> or that woman הַהִ֜וא <WH1931> he אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who עָ֠שׂוּ <WH6213> which have committed אֶת־ <WH853> הַדָּבָ֨ר <WH1697> thing הָרָ֤ע <WH7451> that wicked הַזֶּה֙ <WH2088> this אֶל־ <WH413> to שְׁעָרֶ֔יךָ <WH8179> unto thy gates אֶת־ <WH853> הָאִ֕ישׁ <WH376> [even] that man א֖וֹ <WH176> or אֶת־ <WH853> הָאִשָּׁ֑ה <WH802> or that woman וּסְקַלְתָּ֥ם <WH5619> and shalt stone בָּאֲבָנִ֖ים <WH68> them with stones וָמֵֽתוּ׃ <WH4191> till they die

עַל־ <WH5921> on פִּ֣י ׀ <WH6310> At the mouth שְׁנַ֣יִם <WH8147> of two עֵדִ֗ים <WH5707> witnesses א֛וֹ <WH176> or שְׁלֹשָׁ֥ה <WH7969> or three עֵדִ֖ים <WH5707> witnesses יוּמַ֣ת <WH4191> shall he that is worthy of death הַמֵּ֑ת <WH4191> be put to death לֹ֣א <WH3808> not יוּמַ֔ת <WH4191> he shall not be put to death עַל־ <WH5921> on פִּ֖י <WH6310> [but] at the mouth עֵ֥ד <WH5707> witness אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> of one

יַ֣ד <WH3027> The hands הָעֵדִ֞ים <WH5707> of the witnesses תִּֽהְיֶה־ <WH1961> become בּ֤וֹ בָרִאשֹׁנָה֙ <WH7223> shall be first לַהֲמִית֔וֹ <WH4191> upon him to put him to death וְיַ֥ד <WH3027> the hands כָּל־ <WH3605> of all הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> of all the people בָּאַחֲרֹנָ֑ה <WH314> and afterward וּבִֽעַרְתָּ֥ <WH1197> away הָרָ֖ע <WH7451> the evil מִקִּרְבֶּֽךָ׃ <WH7130> from among פ

כִּ֣י <WH3588> If יִפָּלֵא֩ <WH6381> too hard מִמְּךָ֨ <WH4480> is too דָבָ֜ר <WH1697> If there arise a matter לַמִּשְׁפָּ֗ט <WH4941> for thee in judgment בֵּֽין־ <WH996> between דָּ֨ם ׀ <WH1818> between blood לְדָ֜ם <WH1818> and blood בֵּֽין־ <WH996> between דִּ֣ין <WH1779> between plea לְדִ֗ין <WH1779> and plea וּבֵ֥ין <WH996> and between נֶ֙גַע֙ <WH5061> and between stroke לָנֶ֔גַע <WH5061> and stroke דִּבְרֵ֥י <WH1697> [being] matters רִיבֹ֖ת <WH7379> of controversy בִּשְׁעָרֶ֑יךָ <WH8179> within thy gates וְקַמְתָּ֣ <WH6963> aloud וְעָלִ֔יתָ <WH5927> and get thee up אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמָּק֔וֹם <WH4725> into the place אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which יִבְחַ֛ר <WH977> shall choose יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> thy God בּֽוֹ׃

וּבָאתָ֗ <WH935> And thou shalt come אֶל־ <WH413> about הַכֹּהֲנִים֙ <WH3548> unto the priests הַלְוִיִּ֔ם <WH3881> the Levites וְאֶל־ <WH413> and unto הַשֹּׁפֵ֔ט <WH8199> and unto the judge אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who יִהְיֶ֖ה <WH1961> become בַּיָּמִ֣ים <WH3117> that shall be in those days הָהֵ֑ם <WH1992> those וְדָרַשְׁתָּ֙ <WH1875> and enquire וְהִגִּ֣ידוּ <WH5046> and they shall shew לְךָ֔ אֵ֖ת <WH853> דְּבַ֥ר <WH1697> thee the sentence הַמִּשְׁפָּֽט׃ <WH4941> of judgment

וְעָשִׂ֗יתָ <WH6213> And thou shalt do עַל־ <WH5921> according פִּ֤י <WH6310> to the terms הַדָּבָר֙ <WH1697> of the verdict אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which יַגִּ֣ידֽוּ <WH5046> shall shew לְךָ֔ מִן־ <WH4480> that הַמָּק֣וֹם <WH4725> which they of that place הַה֔וּא <WH1931> he אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which יִבְחַ֣ר <WH977> shall choose יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> which the LORD וְשָׁמַרְתָּ֣ <WH8104> thee and thou shalt observe לַעֲשׂ֔וֹת <WH6213> to do כְּכֹ֖ל <WH3605> to all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which יוֹרֽוּךָ׃ <WH3384> according to all that they inform

עַל־ <WH5921> According פִּ֨י <WH6310> According to the sentence הַתּוֹרָ֜ה <WH8451> of the law אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which יוֹר֗וּךָ <WH3384> which they shall teach וְעַל־ <WH5921> and according הַמִּשְׁפָּ֛ט <WH4941> thee and according to the judgment אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which יֹאמְר֥וּ <WH559> which they shall tell לְךָ֖ תַּעֲשֶׂ֑ה <WH6213> thee thou shalt do לֹ֣א <WH3808> shall not תָס֗וּר <WH5493> thou shalt not decline מִן־ <WH4480> from הַדָּבָ֛ר <WH1697> from the sentence אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which יַגִּ֥ידֽוּ <WH5046> which they shall shew לְךָ֖ יָמִ֥ין <WH3225> thee [to] the right hand וּשְׂמֹֽאל׃ <WH8040> nor [to] the left

וְהָאִ֞ישׁ <WH376> And the man אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who יַעֲשֶׂ֣ה <WH6213> that will do בְזָד֗וֹן <WH2087> presumptuously לְבִלְתִּ֨י <WH1115> not שְׁמֹ֤עַ <WH8085> and will not hearken אֶל־ <WH413> to הַכֹּהֵן֙ <WH3548> unto the priest הָעֹמֵ֞ד <WH5975> that standeth לְשָׁ֤רֶת <WH8334> to minister שָׁם֙ <WH8033> there אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֣ה <WH3069> God אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> thy God א֖וֹ <WH176> nor אֶל־ <WH413> to הַשֹּׁפֵ֑ט <WH8199> or unto the judge וּמֵת֙ <WH4191> shall die הָאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> even that man הַה֔וּא <WH1931> you וּבִֽעַרְתָּ֥ <WH1197> and thou shalt put away הָרָ֖ע <WH7451> the evil מִיִּשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> from Israel

וְכָל־ <WH3605> all הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> And all the people יִשְׁמְע֣וּ <WH8085> shall hear וְיִרָ֑אוּ <WH3372> and fear וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> and will not יְזִיד֖וּן <WH2102> and do no more presumptuously עֽוֹד׃ <WH5750> again ס

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> When תָבֹ֣א <WH935> When thou art come אֶל־ <WH413> about הָאָ֗רֶץ <WH776> unto the land אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH430> thy God נֹתֵ֣ן <WH5414> giveth לָ֔ךְ וִֽירִשְׁתָּ֖הּ <WH3423> thee and shalt possess וְיָשַׁ֣בְתָּה <WH3427> it and shalt dwell בָּ֑הּ וְאָמַרְתָּ֗ <WH559> therein and shalt say אָשִׂ֤ימָה <WH7760> I will set עָלַי֙ <WH5921> over מֶ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> a king כְּכָל־ <WH3605> all הַגּוֹיִ֖ם <WH1471> over me like as all the nations אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who סְבִיבֹתָֽי׃ <WH5439> that [are] about

שׂ֣וֹם <WH7760> Thou shalt in any wise תָּשִׂ֤ים <WH7760> set עָלֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH5921> over מֶ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> [him] king אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> whom יִבְחַ֛ר <WH977> shall choose יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> over thee whom the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> thy God בּ֑וֹ מִקֶּ֣רֶב <WH7130> [one] from among אַחֶ֗יךָ <WH251> thy brethren תָּשִׂ֤ים <WH7760> shalt thou set עָלֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH5921> over מֶ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> king לֹ֣א <WH3808> not תוּכַ֗ל <WH3201> over thee thou mayest לָתֵ֤ת <WH5414> not set עָלֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH5921> over אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> a נָכְרִ֔י <WH5237> foreigner אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who לֹֽא־ <WH3808> is not אָחִ֖יךָ <WH251> over thee which [is] not thy brother הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he

רַק֮ <WH7535> but לֹא־ <WH3808> nor יַרְבֶּה־ <WH7235> But he shall not multiply לּ֣וֹ סוּסִים֒ <WH5483> horses וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> shall never יָשִׁ֤יב <WH7725> to return אֶת־ <WH853> הָעָם֙ <WH5971> to himself nor cause the people מִצְרַ֔יְמָה <WH4714> to Egypt לְמַ֖עַן <WH4616> because of הַרְבּ֣וֹת <WH7235> to the end that he should multiply ס֑וּס <WH5483> horses וַֽיהוָה֙ <WH3068> forasmuch as the LORD אָמַ֣ר <WH559> hath said לָכֶ֔ם לֹ֣א <WH3808> shall never תֹסִפ֗וּן <WH3254> unto you Ye shall henceforth לָשׁ֛וּב <WH7725> return בַּדֶּ֥רֶךְ <WH1870> no more that way הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> he עֽוֹד׃ <WH5750> again

וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> or יַרְבֶּה־ <WH7235> Neither shall he multiply לּוֹ֙ נָשִׁ֔ים <WH802> wives וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> else יָס֖וּר <WH5493> turn לְבָב֑וֹ <WH3824> to himself that his heart וְכֶ֣סֶף <WH3701> to himself silver וְזָהָ֔ב <WH2091> and gold לֹ֥א <WH3808> nor יַרְבֶּה־ <WH7235> multiply לּ֖וֹ מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> not away neither shall he greatly

וְהָיָ֣ה <WH1961> shall come כְשִׁבְתּ֔וֹ <WH3427> And it shall be when he sitteth עַ֖ל <WH5921> on כִּסֵּ֣א <WH3678> upon the throne מַמְלַכְתּ֑וֹ <WH4467> of his kingdom וְכָ֨תַב <WH3789> that he shall write ל֜וֹ אֶת־ <WH853> מִשְׁנֵ֨ה <WH4932> him a copy הַתּוֹרָ֤ה <WH8451> of this law הַזֹּאת֙ <WH2063> likewise עַל־ <WH5921> on סֵ֔פֶר <WH5612> in a book מִלִּפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> out of [that which is] before הַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <WH3548> the priests הַלְוִיִּֽם׃ <WH3881> the Levites

וְהָיְתָ֣ה <WH1961> become עִמּ֔וֹ <WH5973> and he וְקָ֥רָא <WH7121> And it shall be with him and he shall read ב֖וֹ כָּל־ <WH3605> all יְמֵ֣י <WH3117> therein all the days חַיָּ֑יו <WH2416> of his life לְמַ֣עַן <WH4616> because of יִלְמַ֗ד <WH3925> that he may learn לְיִרְאָה֙ <WH3372> to fear אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהָ֔יו <WH430> his God לִ֠שְׁמֹר <WH8104> to keep אֶֽת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all דִּבְרֵ֞י <WH1697> all the words הַתּוֹרָ֥ה <WH8451> of this law הַזֹּ֛את <WH2063> likewise וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַחֻקִּ֥ים <WH2706> and these statutes הָאֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> and these לַעֲשֹׂתָֽם׃ <WH6213> to do

לְבִלְתִּ֤י <WH1115> because רוּם־ <WH7311> be not lifted up לְבָבוֹ֙ <WH3824> That his heart מֵֽאֶחָ֔יו <WH251> above his brethren וּלְבִלְתִּ֛י <WH1115> may not ס֥וּר <WH5493> and that he turn not aside מִן־ <WH4480> above הַמִּצְוָ֖ה <WH4687> from the commandment יָמִ֣ין <WH3225> [to] the right hand וּשְׂמֹ֑אול <WH8040> or [to] the left לְמַעַן֩ <WH4616> so יַאֲרִ֨יךְ <WH748> to the end that he may prolong יָמִ֧ים <WH3117> [his] days עַל־ <WH5921> in מַמְלַכְתּ֛וֹ <WH4467> in his kingdom ה֥וּא <WH1931> he וּבָנָ֖יו <WH1121> he and his children בְּקֶ֥רֶב <WH7130> in the midst יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel ס
